# Question 1
```{r}
here::i_am("SOLAL.Rproj")
library(here)
library(readr)
data <- read.csv(here("grades.csv"))
```

# Question 2
The data set contains `r NROW(data)` grades. 

# Question 3
```{r}
library(dplyr)
nb_students <- data |>
  distinct(id)
```
The data set contains `r NROW(nb_students)` students 

# Question 4
```{r}
students <- data |>
  distinct(id, .keep_all = TRUE) |>
  summarise(id, group)

students |>
  slice_tail(n = 10) |>
  knitr::kable()
```
